name: PartyExcuse
0:
”Alexa, open Party Excuse”
”an excuse to party today”
”excuse to party on April 20th”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: party excuse
des: Party Excuses is a calendar of random and weird holidays so you'll almost always have a reason to party. Just ask Party Excuses for an excuse to party on a date and it'll surely find a reason for you to turn up.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
